/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the translation of foreign correspondence and documents, including
referrals for translation of foreign documents within the local RO
, and
action to take when translation is not obtainable using local resources
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Adjudication Procedures for Foreign Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B
